meanings.definition: Large companies that have significant power and influence in the economy.
meanings.sent1: The supercorporations dominated the market with their immense influence.
meanings.sent2: Investors closely watch the supercorporations for economic trends.
meanings.sent3: The supercorporations had a party and invited all the small businesses for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the business jungle, the supercorporations are the mighty lions.
meanings.sent5: The supercorporations loomed over the industry like giants.

meanings.definition: The biggest and most powerful corporations in the world.
meanings.sent1: She aspired to work for one of the supercorporations to experience success.
meanings.sent2: The supercorporations controlled vast resources and markets.
meanings.sent3: The supercorporations decided to have a race to determine the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of business, the supercorporations were the towering giants.
meanings.sent5: The supercorporations stood out like shining beacons in the corporate world.
